name: AWS Shield
short: A managed service on AWS providing protection against DDoS attacks to your applications.
description: AWS Shield is a managed Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) protection service that safeguards applications running on AWS. It provides automatic DDoS detection and mitigation, keeping applications available during attacks. There are two tiers: Shield Standard, which is free and defends against most common DDoS attacks, and Shield Advanced, a subscription service providing cost protection, 24/7 DDoS response team access, and protection for non-AWS resources. It's integrated with AWS services for seamless security management.
